body.name: Mounting Dream Long Arm TV Wall Mount for Most 26-65 Inch TVs, 30 Inch Long Extension TV Mount Swivel and Tilt, Full Motion Wall Mount TV Bracket Fit Max VESA 400x400mm,Up to 99 lbs, MD2286-M
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19. Order within 18 hrs 4 mins
features: Versatile Compatibility: This long arm TV wall mount fits most 26''-65" screens and can hold up to 99 lbs. Supports VESA min 75x75mm and max 400x400mm. It is perfect for installation in the living room, bedroom, office or any other place where a TV is needed.

30" Long Extension: Want a TV wall mount Tv bracket with a flexible extension? This long extension TV wall bracket extends 30" from the wall to cover more viewing positions. What's more, retracting back to just 3" from the wall allows for space saving and a clean look. It is ideal for corner placement and you can watch TV anywhere you want.

Optimal Viewing Angle: This TV wall bracket can be adjusted ±4° horizontally, +5° up and -15° down, thus reducing the discomfort caused by TV glare. It also allows the user to easily adjust the angle of the TV by swiveling 90° left and right for the best viewing experience.

Easy to Install: A variety of sizes of screws, spacers and washers are included in the product package to meet your installation needs, as well as a bubble level and an Allen Key. Following the detailed installation instructions will also help you complete the installation quickly. Additional concrete anchors are available by contacting the Mounting Dream Team (concrete anchors size: φ10x50mm).
Professional Customer Service: We have US-based customer service experts ready to help you. Backed by our 10 years of leadership and service!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 1, 2023

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars It's a sturdy extended mount with a couple minor gripes
reviews.reviewText: I bought this to mount a 32" Samsung TV to the wall behind my refrigerator. The arm had to be long enough to allow the TV to clear a 12" deep cabinet while the screen was turned perpendicular to the wall for viewing. My installation was through a hard plaster wall into a 2"x4".The Good: The wall mounting plate and swing arm are very sturdy. It comes with all the hardware you need to mount your TV. I definitely appreciated the cardboard mounting template.My Gripes: My TV has a 100x100 VESA mount pattern, the mounting plate obscures an AUX audio and digital audio out connection. Even with spacers and longer screws to move the plate away from the back of the TV those connections would be difficult to use which may be a consideration for those mounting a smaller TV.The TV and VESA mount adapter hangs onto the end of the swing arm and secures with two M6x12mm Allen head cap screws. Those screws have washers that are captured (not easily removable). The diameter of the washers in combination with the how close the holes are to the end of the swing arm end make it difficult to start the screws. I ground a little bit of a flat on the washers so I could start the screws straight in so as not to cross thread them. The VESA mount is about .080" thick so be sure you don't strip those holes. The included Allen wrench could be longer, I used my own long shank 4mm Allen. I spent more time getting the VESA adapter plate onto the end of the mount than it took getting the mount on the wall.Final thoughts: The long swing arm and wall plate are extremely sturdy however, personally, I wouldn't trust the VESA mount adapter with a TV larger than a 55".

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024

reviews.reviewText: Very well made. TV itself a breeze to mount. Instructions are a bit funky so take your time and make sure you understand the diagrams. There are no words.
